name: AWS S3 Storage
description: Nodes for managing your AWS S3 Bucket storage.
longDescription: BuildShip provides versatile nodes for seamless interaction with AWS S3 Storage, enabling you to manage your S3 buckets efficiently. Perform operations such as creating, listing, and deleting buckets, uploading and downloading files, and managing bucket properties within your workflows. Experience robust cloud storage integration without the need for complex coding.

name: Airtable
description: Nodes for interacting with your Airtable Databases.
longDescription: BuildShip offers pre-configured nodes to streamline interactions with Airtable databases, allowing effortless integration within your workflows. Easily manage tables, records, and fields, facilitating seamless CRUD operations, API automation, and data synchronization across your Airtable projects.

name: Algolia
description: Nodes for performing the search functionality using Algolia search.
longDescription: BuildShip offers nodes to seamlessly integrate Algolia's powerful search capabilities into your workflows. Easily perform high-speed, relevant searches, manage indexes, and enhance your user experience with minimal configuration. Leverage Algolia's advanced search algorithms to deliver real-time results and improve data retrieval efficiency.

name: Anthropic
description: Nodes for interacting with and using Anthropic's Claude AI Models.
longDescription: Nodes for interacting with Anthropic's Claude AI Models enable easy integration with AI functionalities such as text generation, natural language understanding, and conversational agents. Leverage the advanced capabilities of Claude to build intelligent applications, automate tasks, and enhance user interactions with minimal configuration effort.

name: Assembly AI
description: Nodes that interact with AssemblyAI. This includes AssemblyAI speech-to-text for voice data (such as calls, virtual meetings, and podcasts)
longDescription: BuildShip offers pre-configured nodes for interfacing with Assembly AI, enabling seamless integration of Assembly AI's speech-to-text functionality within your workflows. Easily convert voice data from various sources, such as calls, virtual meetings, and podcasts, into accurate and usable text, facilitating a range of automation and data analysis tasks.

name: Audio
description: Nodes for generating audio, processing, and data extraction
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for generating, processing, and extracting data from audio files. Effortlessly integrate audio capabilities into your workflows to create, analyze, or transform audio data. This can be particularly useful for developing applications involving speech recognition, audio effects, or automated transcription services.

name: Azure
description: Nodes for leveraging the AI Models by Microsoft Azure.
longDescription: Leverage Microsoft Azure's comprehensive set of AI models directly within your workflows using pre-defined nodes. These integrations facilitate easy access to Azure's cognitive services, enabling tasks such as natural language processing, image recognition, and machine learning model deployment. Seamlessly enhance your applications with Azure's robust AI capabilities.

name: Bing
description: Microsoft Bing Nodes for world-wide-web search.
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for integrating Microsoft Bing services, enabling comprehensive web search functionalities within your workflows. Access Bing’s powerful search engine to extract relevant information, perform data scraping, and integrate search capabilities into your custom applications seamlessly.

name: BuildShip Database
description: Nodes for interacting with BuildShip's Database
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for seamless interaction with its own Database service, allowing users to perform a variety of database operations. With these nodes, you can easily create, read, update, and delete records in your BuildShip Database. The integration also supports complex queries, data filtering, and batch operations to streamline your workflows.

name: BuildShip File Storage
description: Nodes for storing your files in the built-in BuildShip Storage
longDescription: BuildShip's File Storage integration offers nodes that allow you to store, manage, and retrieve files within its built-in storage system. This integration simplifies handling file uploads and downloads, making it easy to manage file storage directly within your workflows. Perfect for handling assets in a variety of applications, from simple document storage to complex media management solutions.

name: BuildShip Workflows
description: Nodes to interact with other BuildShip Workflows
longDescription: BuildShip Workflows provides a set of pre-configured nodes that enable seamless interaction between multiple workflows within the BuildShip platform. These nodes allow you to trigger, manage, and coordinate activities between different workflows, enhancing process automation and optimizing task execution. This integration helps streamline complex workflows by enabling modular design and efficient data flow between interconnected processes.

name: Cloud Storage
description: Manages files in google cloud storage
longDescription: Cloud Storage allows you to store and serve user-generated content like photos, videos, and other media directly to your app. Manage and manipulate files stored in Google Cloud Storage with ease, enabling seamless and secure access to the storage of large amounts of unstructured data across the globe.

name: Cohere
description: Leverage LLM models via Cohere API
longDescription: Utilize Cohere's pre-built nodes to seamlessly harness powerful Large Language Models (LLMs) via the Cohere API. Perform text generation, classification, and embedding tasks with ease, accelerating your AI and natural language processing projects and workflows efficiently.

name: DEV
description: Nodes for manipulating and publishing blog content to dev.to.
longDescription: BuildShip offers pre-configured nodes for publishing and managing blog posts on dev.to. Seamlessly interface with the dev.to API to create, update, and delete articles, enhancing your blogging workflow by automating content management tasks for efficient publishing and maintenance.

name: Discord
description: Nodes for integrating Discord into your workflow.
longDescription: BuildShip offers pre-configured nodes for seamless integration with Discord, enabling you to automate and manage various Discord activities within your workflows. Easily send messages, manage channels, and interact with your community directly from your applications, leveraging Discord's extensive range of functionalities.

name: Document AI
description: Document processing with Document AI
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for Google Cloud Document AI, allowing for seamless integration of advanced document processing capabilities within your workflows. Effortlessly extract and process data from scanned documents, PDFs, and images, enhancing automation and improving accuracy in data handling and extraction tasks.

name: ElevenLabs
description: Nodes for utilizing ElevenLabs Text to Speech capabilities in your workflow
longDescription: Leverage ElevenLabs Text to Speech capabilities within your projects using pre-built nodes that streamline interaction. Integrate high-quality, natural-sounding speech synthesis into your workflows effortlessly, enabling a range of applications from automated announcements to personalized audio content generation.

name: FFmpeg
description: Nodes for working with FFmpeg for video and audio processing.
longDescription: Nodes for FFmpeg integration facilitate powerful video and audio processing automation within your workflows. Utilize FFmpeg's extensive functionalities to transcode, convert, edit, and stream multimedia content efficiently. Simplify complex media manipulation tasks with pre-configured nodes tailored for FFmpeg operations, enabling streamlined media workflows and seamless integration into your applications.

name: Fal AI
description: Nodes to leverage Fal's ready-to-use AI model APIs.
longDescription: Fal AI provides pre-configured nodes to seamlessly integrate with Fal's suite of AI model APIs. This allows users to leverage powerful pre-built AI models quickly within their applications or workflows, enabling functionalities like natural language processing, computer vision, and predictive analytics without extensive coding.

name: Firebase
description: Nodes for working with Firebase services and authentication
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for Firestore integration, making it easy to interact with Firebase services within your workflows. Interact seamlessly with your own Firebase projects, performing a range of CRUD operations, building APIs, automations, Cron Jobs, and more.

name: Firestore
description: Nodes for working with Firebase Firestore database
longDescription: BuildShip offers pre-defined nodes to interact with Firebase Firestore, enabling seamless integration within your workflows. Easily perform a variety of CRUD operations on your Firestore databases, manage collections, and automate data handling tasks.

name: FlutterFlow
description: Nodes for performing actions in your FlutterFlow frontend application.
longDescription: BuildShip offers comprehensive nodes that integrate directly with FlutterFlow, enabling smooth interactions with your frontend applications built on the platform. Utilize these nodes to automate tasks, streamline workflows, and enhance the functionality within your FlutterFlow projects.

name: Gemini
description: Google's Gemini AI Nodes and Models.
longDescription: BuildShip offers integrated nodes to utilize Google's Gemini AI, seamlessly connecting Google's advanced AI models with your own projects. name: GitHub

longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for seamless integration with GitHub, enabling interactions with repositories and other services. Users can effortlessly manage repositories, issues, pull requests, and more within their workflows. This integration facilitates automation of GitHub operations, enhancing development and collaboration productivity.

name: Gmail
description: OAuth Nodes for utilizing the Gmail API to retrieve and perform operations based on your Gmail Account.
longDescription: Utilize BuildShip's OAuth nodes to seamlessly connect with the Gmail API, enabling you to perform a variety of operations such as retrieving emails, sending messages, managing drafts, and organizing labels. This integration ensures secure and efficient access to your Gmail account for enhanced email management automation.

name: Google Calendar
description: OAuth Nodes for utilizing the Google Calendar API to retrieve and perform operations based on your Google Calendars.
longDescription: Utilize BuildShip's OAuth nodes to seamlessly integrate with the Google Calendar API. By leveraging these nodes, you can effortlessly retrieve, create, update, and delete events, allowing for dynamic scheduling, automation, and calendar management within your workflows.

name: Google Cloud
description: Nodes for interacting with the Google Cloud Platform
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for seamless integration with Google Cloud Platform services. This allows users to interact with various GCP offerings, such as Google Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, BigQuery, and more. Perform tasks like data analysis, storage management, and scalable computing within your workflows effortlessly.

name: Google Cloud Storage
description: Nodes for storing your files on your own Google Cloud Storage Bucket
longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes that allow you to seamlessly store and manage your files on Google Cloud Storage. Effortlessly integrate your workflow with Google Cloud's scalable and secure file storage solution, performing tasks like uploading, downloading, and managing files within your own Google Cloud Storage Bucket.

name: Google Docs
description: OAuth Nodes for utilizing the Google Docs API to perform operations on your Google Docs File.
longDescription: BuildShip offers OAuth Nodes specifically designed for integrating with the Google Docs API, enabling seamless interaction with your Google Docs files directly within your workflows. Utilize these nodes to read, write, update, and manage your documents efficiently, automating repetitive tasks and enhancing productivity.

name: Google Maps
description: Nodes for performing actions using the Google Maps API provided by Google.

Effortlessly incorporate robust mapping functionalities into your workflows for enhanced geospatial data handling and location-based services.

This enables you to automate tasks, extract insights from your search performance, and optimize your website's visibility with minimal effort.

name: Google Translate

longDescription: Streamline your workflow with BuildShip's pre-defined nodes for Notion integration. longDescription: Replicate offers pre-defined nodes for integrating and utilizing hosted open-source machine learning models within your workflows. longDescription: BuildShip provides pre-defined nodes for integrating with Resend, making it simple to incorporate email sending capabilities into your workflows. longDescription: BuildShip provides nodes to easily integrate with SendGrid for sending emails within your workflows. Automate your email communications, manage templates, track delivery rates, and handle transactional and marketing email campaigns seamlessly.

longDescription: BuildShip provides nodes for SignNow integration, enabling streamlined sending and processing of electronic signatures within your automated workflows. longDescription: Seamlessly integrate StabilityAI's advanced machine learning models with BuildShip's pre-defined nodes.
